entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 18 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening then becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
